Key Match Events: Mbappe (68') and Rabiot (73') scored for France
Wirtz (1') and Havertz (49') scored for Germany
Pre-Game Insights: France are on a run of five successive home friendly wins
Germany have only achieved six victories from their subsequent 22 fixtures
Thomas Muller and Leroy Sane's efforts saw the Germans end a six-game winless run against France with a 2-1 success back in September
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps's side ought to make the most of Germany's current predicament and lay down a serious marker ahead of Euro 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Parc Olympique Lyonnais
Atletico Madrid attacker and Bleus mainstay Antoine Griezmann has succumbed to an ankle injury
Germany have been devoid of competitive action since exiting the World Cup with a whimper for the second time in a row in 2022
